body: We are using TestActivityEnvironment to isolate activity testing, but the challenge for us is that we need to inject an ActivityCompletionClient into the activity, which is only available from TestWorkflowEnvironment. I tried this approach and the test didn't work (null pointer exception).. it'd be great if you have an example for testing an isolated activity that uses ActivityCompletionClient. Thanks!
